name: SerpentStorm
description:
Serpent Storm is what happens when your brain tries to mash up the classic Snake and a Bullet Heaven style game like Vampire Survivors.

  • Move your snake around by using A/S or left/right arrows, do not hit the sides, yourself or the enemies(red).
  • Kill enemies, every 10 kills gets you a powerup(green).
  • Every 20 seconds the game speeds up.
  • Collect powerups for extra sections, each comes with a gun.

Feel free to leave your feedback (and high-scores) in the comments.
